install.name: VirtueMart Login
install.author: The VirtueMart Development Team
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2007-2008 Greg Perkins. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module provides login/logout functionality for VirtueMart .

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module; this allows individual module styling.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: This is the text or HTML that is displayed above the Login form.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-text
param.description: This is the text or HTML that is displayed below the Login form.

param.name: login
param.label: Login redirection
param.description: The page the user is redirected to after login.
param.option: Page from which the user logged in

param.name: logout
param.label: Logout redirection
param.description: The page the user is redirected to after logout.
param.option: Page from which the user logged out

param.name: name
param.label: Name/Username
param.description: Show the username or name in the greeting.
